Jordan Brock

Tom Waits

Jun 13, 2008

A great interview with Tom Waits (by Tom Waits himself) that includes this bit of gold:

Q: What's heaven for you?

A: Me and my wife on Route 66 with a pot of coffee, 
a cheap guitar, pawnshop tape recorder in a Motel 6, 
and a car that runs good parked right by the door.

p. Also, make sure you watch his performance of Chocolate Jesus on Letterman.
